descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Cade Cunningham weaves through the Rockets' defense and finishes the layup in the lane.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cunningham finishes the coast-to-coast layup) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cunningham finishes the coast-to-coast layup

videos.description: Daniel Theis threads the bounce pass to Christian Wood for the two-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Theis, Wood's 2-man game leads to the slam) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Theis, Wood's 2-man game leads to the slam

videos.description: Jalen Green drives down the lane and finishes the tough layup through the contact.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jalen Green impresses in the lane) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jalen Green impresses in the lane

videos.description: Christian Wood drives baseline and dunks it on Cade Cunningham.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Wood flexes after dunk on Cunningham) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Wood flexes after dunk on Cunningham

videos.description: Saddiq Bey nails the long 3-pointer right at the first-half buzzer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bey splashes 3 to end the half) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bey splashes 3 to end the half

videos.description: Kevin Porter Jr. throws down the huge double-clutch dunk. Cade Cunningham would respond with his third three of the night.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cunningham responds to Porter's huge dunk with a 3) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cunningham responds to Porter's huge dunk with a 3

videos.description: Jalen Green crushes the huge dunk and lets out a yell resulting in a technical foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Green gets tech for yelling at Cunningham after dunk) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Green gets tech for yelling at Cunningham after dunk

videos.description: After the Rockets cut the lead to four, Cade Cunningham knocks down the clutch 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Cunningham knocks down huge 3
